CustomField.description: Dictates if the Weekly commit Roll-up flow should run. (If TRUE -> Run flow) Flow runs on a Monday. If 1st of next month falls on Tues-Fri of the same week, then needs to run for 2 months, so box is ticked for both. Also has to take into account CY rollover. Calculation Explained: 1. Tick box if its current Month 2. Tick Box if next Month starts within the next 4 days. (Flow runs Monday, so counts until Friday) 3. Tick box if 1st of Jan is within next 4 days.
CustomField.formula: (MONTH( X1st_of_Commit_Month__c ) = MONTH(TODAY()) && YEAR( X1st_of_Commit_Month__c ) = YEAR(TODAY())) || (Number_of_Days_until_Next_Month__c <= 4 && (MONTH( X1st_of_Commit_Month__c ) = (MONTH(TODAY()) +1 ) && YEAR( X1st_of_Commit_Month__c ) = YEAR(TODAY()))) || (DATE((YEAR(TODAY())+1), 1, 1) - TODAY()) <= 4
CustomField.label: Run Weekly Commit
